name: Demon_X
description: Daemon X is a Demon Lord Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody . As a result of the "Crown of Wrath" manifesting over its head due to it taking in the X-Antibody, Daemon's power started to increase as its anger grew. It is said that when that anger exceeds its limit, power surpassing even that of Ultra Digimon bursts forth.
